settings.title: Sonnen Batterie settings
settings.subtitle: Please provide information for api-usage.
settings.note: Please restart the app, after changing settings.
settings.frequencyHint: Frequency in seconds. How often to pull for data. Default is 30 seconds (30).
settings.authTokenHint: Auth Token is retrieved from user-login on your Sonnen Batterie system.
settings.savedOk: Settings saved. You can close this dialog now.
settings.settings.deviceStateHint: Shows the current state of the devices.
settings.error_no_batteries: Could not find any Sonnen batteries on the local network. Please check your network and try again or provide static IP.
settings.invalid_ip_format: Invalid IP address format. Please enter a valid IPv4 address.
settings.invalid_auth: Unauthorized: Invalid Auth-Token or Write API not enabled.

connection.notification_ip_changed: Sonnen Batterie: Change of IP address detected. New IP address: __ip__
connection.error: Could not connect to the battery with IP '__ip__'. Please check the device settings.

http.400: Bad request. Invalid data or validation failed
http.401: Invalid Auth Token or required Read/Write API not enabled.

ToU.invalid threshold: Time-of-Use max. power values must be between 0 and 46000 watts.
